title: Classic Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs with salt and pepper, melt butter in pan, cook eggs until set. Fold and serve.

title: Tomato Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta. Sauté garlic in olive oil, add tomato and salt, simmer. Toss with pasta.

title: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast bread, mash avocado with lemon, salt, pepper. Spread on toast.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Stir fry chopped vegetables in oil, add garlic and soy sauce. Serve hot.

title: Cheesy Potato Bake
instructions: Slice potatoes, layer with cheese and seasoning. Pour over milk, dot butter, bake until golden.

title: Simple Chicken Rice
instructions: Cook chicken and onion, add rice and seasoning, simmer until done.

title: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Sauté onion and mushroom, add rice, gradually add broth, finish with cheese.

title: Egg Fried Rice
instructions: Scramble eggs, stir fry with rice, vegetables, and soy sauce.

title: Tuna Salad
instructions: Mix tuna, mayo, chopped onion, serve over lettuce or on bread.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter bread, sandwich cheese, grill until golden.
